Desc.entry: A registered charity and voluntary organisation working with teenagers aged 10-16 years who are at risk of, or are already disengaging from mainstream education. Also helps young people who have low self esteem and are being bullied. Works closely with young people from the Foster Care Association and Key Stage 3 and Key Stage 4 units in Sheffield. Referral via schools, the Children and Young People's Service and the Foster Care Association.
